requirements.summary: Revert the application to the last known stable state before recent changes, restoring both frontend and backend code to ensure the app builds, deploys, and functions correctly with working registration, gallery, admin dashboard, and CMS content features
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully to the network
All previously working features (registration, gallery, admin dashboard, CMS content) function correctly
The admin login and dashboard data loading work as expected

file_operations.description: Restore the stable router configuration and route definitions, ensuring all routes (home, about, event details, gallery, registration lookup, admin login/dashboard) are properly registered with correct component imports and path mappings

Revert any problematic changes to the CMS component, restoring stable state management, form handling, and backend mutation calls for Hero, About, Event Details, Coordinators, and Contact content sections
Restore the working registration form component with proper validation, submission handling, and success dialog display, ensuring the mutation hook integration works correctly

Revert the admin dashboard to its stable state with functioning tabs for registrations, gallery, and content management, including working search, CSV export, delete operations, and data loading from React Query hooks
Restore the stable admin login page with correct form handling and backend authentication integration, ensuring successful redirect to dashboard after login
Revert any breaking changes to the query and mutation hooks, restoring stable React Query integration with proper error handling, cache management, and backend actor calls for all CRUD operations
Restore the stable actor initialization logic with correct identity handling, query invalidation on identity changes, and proper actor caching to ensure reliable backend communication
Revert any changes to the admin authentication context, ensuring stable session storage persistence and correct login/logout state management
Restore the stable hero section with working countdown timer, registration count display, typewriter effect, and CMS content integration with proper fallback defaults
Revert to the stable About component with functioning scroll animations, feature card rendering, and CMS content fetching with correct fallback handling
Restore the stable event details component with proper content display, timeline rendering, and scroll-triggered animations working correctly
Revert the coordinators component to its working state with proper data fetching and card rendering for faculty and student coordinators
Restore the stable contact section with working map embed, social links, and CMS content integration
Revert the gallery page to its stable state with functioning image loading, grid display, and scroll animations
Restore the stable home page layout with all section components properly composed and rendered
Revert the registration lookup page to its working state with correct email search functionality and result display
Restore the stable React app entry point with correct provider wrapping order and initialization
Revert any CSS changes that may have broken styling, restoring stable global styles, theme variables, and animation keyframes
Restore the stable Tailwind configuration with correct color tokens, plugins, and theme settings
